Package Interfaces.SoftwareProducts

Class SoftwareProduct

java.lang.Object
Interfaces.SoftwareProducts.SoftwareProduct
All Implemented Interfaces:
DiscountCalculation, Comparable<SoftwareProduct>
Direct Known Subclasses:
Game, OperatingSystem, ProgrammingLanguage, Utility
public abstract class SoftwareProduct extends Object implements DiscountCalculation, Comparable<SoftwareProduct>
This class represents a software product.
